short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows to easily add coordinates to the monuments inside Armenian Wikipedia using Google Maps

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Visit http://bit.ly/19CKUU4 after installation to access the lists of monuments.

Available on github: https://github.com/Hrant-Khachatrian/WikiMonumentsCoordinates
